title: Develop a Campaign Budget
description: A planner needs to create a recommended budget allocation for an upcoming quarterly campaign.

tasks.description: Review the campaign goals and the total available budget.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent identifies the overall budget and key objectives.

tasks.description: Research industry benchmarks for cost-per-click (CPC) and cost-per-mille (CPM) for the selected channels.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent gathers typical cost data for the planned media channels.

tasks.description: Create a budget spreadsheet that allocates the total budget across channels (e.g., 50% Search, 40% Social, 10% Display) based on goals and cost estimates.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a logical and well-justified budget allocation plan.
